message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, I believe it will be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $18,500? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $18,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
